authors: Ziming Liu, Max Tegmark, Pingchuan Ma, Wojciech Matusik, and Yixuan Wang
items.summary: Kolmogorov-Arnold networks combine the predictive strength of deep learning with the interpretability of symbolic formulas, enabling AI systems to both validate physical laws and generate new scientific insights. [Phys. Rev. X 15, 041051] Published Wed Dec 17, 2025

items.title: High-Temperature Partition Functions and Classical Simulatability of Long-Range Quantum Systems
authors: Jorge Sánchez-Segovia, Jan T. Schneider, and Álvaro M. Alhambra
items.summary: A subexponential time algorithm for the classical simulation of high-temperature long-range interacting quantum systems is introduced through a study of their partition functions. [PRX Quantum 6, 040366] Published Wed Dec 17, 2025
